movie.title: Trainspotting
movie.actors: Ewan McGregor, Ewen Bremner, Jonny Lee Miller, Kevin McKidd
movie.plot: A wild, freeform, Rabelaisian trip through the darkest recesses of Edinburgh low-life, focusing on Mark Renton and his attempt to give up his heroin habit, and how the latter affects his relationship with family and friends: Sean Connery wannabe Sick Boy, dimbulb Spud, psycho Begbie, 14-year-old girlfriend Diane, and clean-cut athlete Tommy, who's never touched drugs but can't help being curious about them...
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 20 wins & 18 nominations.
movie.tomatoConsensus: A brutal, often times funny, other times terrifying portrayal of drug addiction in Edinburgh. Not for the faint of heart, but well worth viewing as a realistic and entertaining reminder of the horrors of drug use.
